Package edu.jhu.cs.oose.fall2014.group19.neverEatAlone.client.gui.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddFriendsActivity
    This activity is used to set the view and control the logic related to add friends function
    ChangePasswordActivity
    Activity used for the change password page
    ContactsActivity
    This class handles controller operations for the contacts tab
    CreateMealInformationActivity
    This class handles the meal information of the creation of an invite.
    DatePickerFragment
    This class construct a date picker.
    DisplayContactNotificationActivity
    This class handles the display of contact notification.
    DisplayMessageActivity  
    EditProfileActivity
    Activity used for edit profile page
    InvitesActivity
    This class handles controller operations for the invites tab.
    MainActivity
    This is the main activity that is displayed when the application starts.
    MealDetailActivity  
    MyPostsActivity  
    NotificationTestActivity  
    PostInformationActivity
    This class is used to control the post information page.
    ProfileActivity
    ProfileActivity is used to set up the view of Profile page
    RegisterActivity
    This class handles controller logic for the registration Activity.
    SelectFriendsActivity
    This activity is used to handle controller operations for select friends page.
    TabHostActivity  
    TimePickerFragment
    This class construct a time picker.
